item.title: Password audits
item.description: This should be a brief overview on why and how to perform a password audit on a windows domain

item.title: What Virtual Machines Am I Running?
item.description: Every server that i run in my homelab is more then often a virtual machine, and heres the run down!

item.title: Voltage glitching on the cheap
item.description: Stand back! We’re doing science! voltage glitching on an Arduino

item.title: SDL: Bolt on or Built in?
item.description: Time is of the essence. Every day that a business is anything less then fully secure is a day exposed to hackers. It’s also another day that developers continue building applications without factoring security into their lifecycle.
